programme.title: Epic Trails S01 E04 - New Zealand NB
programme.desc: Eric Hanson explores the world-renowned Abel Tasman National Park by foot, and by sea kayak.

programme.title: The Island With Bear Grylls S02 E01 - The Men- Episode 1 NB
programme.desc: In the ultimate survival experiment, Bear Grylls abandons 14 British men on a remote desert island in the Pacific with just the clothes they stand up in and a few basic tools. They will be completely alone, filming everything themselves. This time the survival challenge will be harder and longer than before, as they attempt to survive entirely on their own wits for six weeks in the height of the tropical storm season. From the very beginning the men face a life and death struggle, as the fierce currents of the Pacific Ocean force Bear to drop them 75 meters off the island. The men have no choice but to jump ship and make a desperate swim through the violent swells onto a treacherous, rocky coastline.

programme.title: Alan Cummings: Paradise Homes S01 E01 - Norfolk and Ontario NB
programme.desc: Alan takes to the water of the Norfolk Broads, where he meets a family who have created their paradise home in a beautifully serene setting by the water. There is more than meets the eye as he discovers the treacherous pike and quicksand close by, learning that practicality is also important in creating paradise! He then dives into the Canadian wilderness to visit an old cabin-converted magical woodland playground. But will he be able to avoid the grizzly bears on his own quest for paradise?

programme.title: My Pacific Quest S01 E05 - The Marshall Islands NB
programme.desc: The Marshall Islands have a long human history, but it is the more recent saga that was thrust upon them during World War II and its aftermath that draws host Ellis Emmett to its shores. Following the Allied victory, the United States moved the local inhabitants from their quiet paradise in order to conduct atomic bomb testing at the famous Bikini Atoll. Ellis explores how, almost 65 years later, both the people and environment continue to be affected.

programme.title: In Search Of Food S01 E03 - San Francisco NB
programme.desc: Fresh produce from the Farmers market, Hog Island Oyster Company's fresh oysters; the Mona Lisa cut of pork.

programme.title: Journey Through the Lofoten Islands
programme.desc: Visit the spectacular Lofoten Islands of northern Norway in this relaxing nature film. Soar above the mystical peaks that plunge into the ocean, and enjoy the quaint villages that dot the remote shorelines of the fjords. The full film is 90 minutes in length and available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview of Seasons of Lake Tahoe
programme.desc: The is a preview of the 3 hour long "Seasons of Lake Tahoe", available to stream at www.NatureStream.tv. Relax and unwind with the spectacular scenery of Lake Tahoe. This 3 hour ambient Nature Film explores the dramatic beauty of one of the worlds most beautiful locations. Experience brilliant turquoise waters, snowy wonderlands, slow motion waterfalls, sunny beaches, and exhilarating aerial views in this breathtaking film.

programme.title: Preview for "Seasons of the Sierra" 3 Hour Ambient Nature Film
programme.desc: Available January 11. Experience the spectacular seasons of the Sierra Mountains in this 3 hour film. From vast swaths of colorful aspens to sparkling wildflower meadows, the "Seasons of the Sierra" showcases the stunning beauty of the Range of Light.

programme.title: Preview of 5 Hour Crackling Fireplace
programme.desc: Enjoy a the sights and sounds of a glowing fire for 5 hours in Parts 1 and 2 of Crackling Fireplace in 4k - by NatureStream.tv. To get full access to visit www.NatureStream.tv and subscribe!

programme.title: Journey Through Maui
programme.desc: Relax with scenes from magical Maui. " Journey through Maui" showcases the natural beauty of Maui, featuring stunning sunsets over the ocean, gentle sea turtles swimming close to shore, and powerful waterfalls surrounded by lush greenery. Underwater scenes highlight the island’s vibrant marine life, with colorful fish and coral formations visible in clear, shallow waters. Each shot captures a peaceful, relaxing atmosphere, inviting viewers to experience the calm and wonder of Maui’s landscapes and seascapes. The full two hour film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Winter Wonder Swiss Alps
programme.desc: Journey through breathtaking mountain beauty in the 90 minute long "Winter Wonder, Swiss Alps". Experience sunrise on the Matterhorn, exhilarating aerial views of mountain peaks, and wondrous ice sculptures deep in glacial caves. A tranquil soundtrack accompanies the awe inspiring scenery at "the top of Europe". Available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv

programme.title: The Kardashians vs. Jordyn Woods
programme.desc: S1:E4 Jordyn Woods was somebody the Kardashian family trusted. But all that changed when rumours of her being a home wrecker emerged after a scandalous yet confusing night at a party with Khloé Kardashian’s then-boyfriend and NBA player, Tristan Thompson. Our team investigated both sides of the story and got the real truth about what happened that night.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: The Rise of Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: S1:E2 Frank Shamrock was one of the toughest fighters to ever compete in the UFC. He holds the world record for the fastest consecutive knockouts, but his biggest fight happened when he was a child, living with his stepfather. His stepfather emotionally abused him so devastatingly, that even when Frank was sent to a Juvenile Detention Center, the other kids couldn’t believe what he went through. While many kids would be crushed under such pain and suffering, Frank Shamrock was determined to prove why warriors always find a way to win.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: Kim Kardashian & Pete Davidson Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E14 The whole world witnessed Kim and Kanyes marriage fall apart. At first it seemed like they were supporting each other through their divorce, but suddenly Kanye started to publicly attack Kim, accusing her of exploiting and kidnapping their children. What happened? Our team did some digging and traced it all back to Kims performance on SNL. Everyone assumes Kanye’s attacks are because of Pete Davidson, but we uncovered the real reason Kanye turned against Kim Kardashian.

programme.title: Jennifer Aniston vs. Brangelina
programme.desc: S1:E12 For almost 20 years, the media portrayed Jennifer Aniston as a heartbroken woman who would never be happy until she had kids. That couldn’t be further from the truth. Our team uncovered details that will prove Brad and Jennifer were the perfect Hollywood couple everybody adored, until Brad suddenly left Jen for Angelina Jolie. This story is so much bigger than Brangelina.

programme.title: Amber Rose vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E5 it true that Kanye West was harassing Amber Rose when she suddenly left him? When Kanye West started dating Amber Rose, he took her from the life of being a stripper to the global superstar world. At first, they seemed like a couple that was truly in love. But when Amber suddenly left Kanye, his attitude towards her completely changed. Our team uncovered the real story behind the tabloids of the years of bullying, unwanted media attention, and attacks that Amber had to suffer. The true story will reveal why she was the special woman Kanye fell in love with in the first place, and what she and Kim Kardashian have in common.

programme.title: Ariana Grande vs. Pete Davidson
programme.desc: S1:E11 What made Kanye West go to war against Pete Davidson? Kanye is relentlessly going after Pete, so much so, that Kim Kardashian is concerned about the safety of her new boyfriend. Is it because Kanye knows Pete’s history of controversial relationships? Our team got the real story behind the tabloids, the truth behind Pete’s behavior in relationships, and the journey he went on to truly start loving who he is.

programme.title: Drake Bell vs. Josh Peck
programme.desc: S1:E15 Everyone loved Drake & Josh but people don’t know the dark story behind the world’s favorite kids’ show. Josh struggled with his weight and addiction while filming the show. It was always painful for him to be the chubby sidekick to the cool, popular Drake. Then Josh shocked the world when he revealed that he and Drake weren’t even really friends. Drake was furious, sparking a massive backlash against Josh. But no one knew just how dark of a path Drake had gone down.

programme.title: Top EPIC MOTIVATIONAL Speeches Vol. 1
programme.desc: Here is Goalcasts collection of the top motivational speeches to get you pumped.

programme.title: EPIC MOTIVATIONAL Top Speeches VOL 3
programme.desc: Trapped in a 9-5 job that you hate? Stuck in debt? If you feel stuck and feel like you’re living a life with no purpose, this video is for you. Hear from motivational moguls Joe Rogan, Robert Downey Jr., Will Smith, Gary Vee and more as they help you to realize your own dreams and break free from the matrix.

programme.title: Denzel Washington's Greatest Life Advice
programme.desc: Denzel Washington’s life advice will change your future and leave you speechless. In this motivational speech, Academy Award-winning actor Denzel Washington will inspire you to transform unfulfilled potential into your dream come true… You don’t have to settle for a life less than the one you’re capable of living. With discipline and consistency, you can claim anything you want in life. Watch this every morning to move one step closer to success.

programme.title: Rihanna vs. Chris Brown
programme.desc: S1:E1 Rihanna found herself the victim of assault, from her best friend and then-boyfriend, Chris Brown. Not only was she humiliated in front of the world, but she also faced further attacks from the media, some going as far as claiming the violence was her fault. We uncovered the real story of Rihanna’s experience during and after the incident, not the one portrayed by the media, where she shows us why she is the strong, compassionate, graceful woman the world fell in love within the first place.

programme.title: Britney Spears vs. Justin Timberlake
programme.desc: S1:E8 Did Britney Spears really cheat on Justin Timberlake? Britney and Justin were the perfect couple until she was accused of cheating on him after their breakup. Justin told the world his side of the story and the media believed him while Britney was mocked and silenced. The whole world watched as Britney went from being the media’s pop princess to spiralling in a very public meltdown, but what did Justin have to do with it? Our team uncovered the truth behind what really happened, and what Justin’s iconic Cry Me a River video has to do with Britney’s freedom.

programme.title: Nicole Kidman vs. Tom Cruise
programme.desc: S1:E9 Was Scientology the reason why Tom Cruise divorced Nicole Kidman? Nicole was obsessed with Tom. She tried to do everything she could to be with the superstar at all times. But Tom had another obsession: Scientology. Then, when Tom Cruise suddenly divorced Nicole, the world she thought she was living in shattered into a million pieces. Was it because of Scientology? Was it the multiple miscarriages she had? Was it the wiretap Tom allegedly put on Nicole? This story was so uncovered, that our team had to dig deep to get the details.

programme.title: Justin Bieber Vs. Hailey Bieber
programme.desc: S2:E7 Justin and Hailey Bieber are at the height of their careers. So why do they keep getting sick? Our team uncovers this isn’t the first time one of Justin’s love interests has had a life-threatening illness. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Selena Gomez with Hailey?

programme.title: Cameron Vs. Justin & Jessica
programme.desc: S1:E13 Cameron Diaz was one of the biggest stars in the world. So why did she leave it all behind? Our team uncovers a link between Cameron’s explosive breakup with Justin Timberlake and her choice to leave acting behind. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Cameron?Justin sparked cheating rumors when he moved on from Cameron 4 days later with Jessica Biel. Our team gets to the truth behind those rumors to reveal the role Justin played in Cameron disappearing and the truth is even more shocking…

programme.title: Your Money Your Wealth: Re-Boot Your IRA
programme.desc: Are you neglecting one of the most precious assets that you have? When it comes to individual retirement accounts or IRAs, many people have a practice of ""fund it and forget it"". But there are strategies you can implement to help maximize the money it generates. The ""Dynamic Duo"" of financial planning, Joe Anderson, CFP, and Alan Clopine, CPA, will help you Re-Boot Your IRA

programme.title: Non-Competes Ruined Your Career Now They are Banned
programme.desc: "Even though the companies and the FTC wont admit it, non-compete agreements were never about competition between one company and another, it was about competition between a company and its employees. "

programme.title: The Homeless Industrial Complex
programme.desc: America has a homelessness crisis as record numbers of people are ending up on the streets of a few concentrated city centers. Cities are spending billions of dollars and helping the homeless has become a lucrative business with multi-million dollar government contracts.

programme.title: "Moon Mining, Racehorses, and Estate Planning"
programme.desc: "Financial advisor Ric Edelman launches into a conversation with a rocket scientist about the economics of mining on the moon, and provides down-to-earth advice on owning a racehorse, banking cash reserves and doing your own estate planning."

programme.title: "Real Estate, Financial Steps, and Medical Breakthroughs"
programme.desc: Financial planner Ric Edelman discusses the pros and cons of investing in real estate; provides a recent college graduate important steps to take now to build her financial future; interviews Dr. Daniel Kraft about medical breakthrough technologies; and Jean Edelman talks about moral courage.

programme.title: "Deferred Comp, Roth Strategies, Asset Protection (and Gold)"
programme.desc: "Mike and his wife in Tampa are 39 and 36, they ve got nearly a million bucks saved. Are they on track for retirement? Kate in California is 55 and hopes to retire in the next couple of years. How should she manage deferred compensation and retirement withdrawals? That s today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast number 514 with Joe Anderson, CFP®, and Big Al Clopine, CPA. Plus, Joe and Big Al answer questions from our YouTube viewers on considering IRMAA when making Roth conversions, paying Roth conversion taxes quarterly or in December or in January, protecting a gifted house from a child s ex, and the tax impact of rebuilding on an inherited property. Finally, 8 years ago, Joe and Big Al said you shouldn t have more than 2 of your portfolio in gold and one YouTube viewer said that did not age too well. What do the fellas think today? We ll find out."

programme.title: "Portfolio Drift, Avoiding Capital Gains, and a $6M Retirement"
programme.desc: "What should you do when the asset allocation of your retirement portfolio drifts? Joe Anderson, CFP and Big Al Clopine, CPA spitball on rebalancing for DJ in St. Louis, today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast number 530. Plus, Coach Dobber in Minnesota is curious about municipal bonds in a brokerage account, and Daniel in Stevensville, Michigan needs details on emergency funds. Also, can Tim the Enchanter do a Roth conversion and avoid the nasty big pointy teeth of capital gains tax? And, Duke in upstate New York told his wife they need 6 million dollars in retirement, and she said he was silly. What say Joe and Al? Well find out."

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: Apex Fusion: Bridging the Blockchain Divide
programme.desc: Imagine a world where blockchains don’t speak different languages. Where Ethereum and Bitcoin don’t just coexist but they collaborate. In this episode we sit down with the visionary founders behind Apex Fusion, a bold layer1 project on a mission to unify the fractured blockchain universe. With a tri-chain architecture and a bridge that actually works, they are not just building tech - they are potentially laying down the infrastructure for the next evolution of web3.

programme.title: TRUMP TO SIGN HUGE $9 TRILLION CRYPTO EXECUTIVE ORDER TODAY
programme.desc: Trump is set to sign an executive order today allowing crypto, gold, and private equity in 401(k) plans! With this, we could see $9 trillion enter the market!

programme.title: Crypto Staking LEGAL in the USA?! BULL MARKET ABOUT TO EXPLODE
programme.desc: The U.S. SEC has exempted liquid staking services from securities regulation, which means top platforms like Lido on Ethereum, and Jito on Solana, are now fully compliant! This is huge news for the industry as a whole and we should be celebrating!

programme.title: Navigating the Future of Finance: AI, Web3, and the Role of Stablecoins at Proof of Talk Paris 2025
programme.desc: Live from Proof of Talk Paris 2025, this episode of The Edge of Show explores the evolution of digital finance, security, and real-world blockchain utility with four visionary leaders shaping the next phase of Web3. First, we spoke with Stephan Lutz, CEO of BitMEX, who shared insights on exchange security, AI-assisted trading, and how BitMEX is navigating a more responsible approach to token listings and trader education. Next, we sat down with Nkiru Uwaje, CEO of Mansa, to learn how her team is powering cross-border payments with stablecoins and building liquidity rails for Africa, Southeast Asia, and Latin America. Then we spoke with Jason Jiang, Chief Business Officer at CertiK, who outlined how real-time monitoring and smarter compliance tools are transforming security in blockchain—and why regulators are finally catching up. Lastly, Damu Winston from Amazon Web3 joined us to discuss the convergence of Web3, AI, and spatial computing—plus a surprise appearance from his personal AI agent Samir, who gave us a glimpse into the not-so-distant future.

programme.title: Generation Speed: MotoAmerica’s Road to MotoGP
programme.desc: The series premieres with an inside look at the launch of MotoAmerica’s new Parts Unlimited Talent Cup by Motul: on-track adrenaline during the first Talent Cup round, and off-track footage—family support, team dynamics, and riders facing nerves, excitement, and the pursuit of their MotoGP dreams.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Superbike
programme.desc: High-octane drama erupts at VIR’s Superbike opener as lead contenders clash in fast, fierce combat… fate to be decided at the flag.

programme.title: Gurney Cup
programme.desc: A 45-minute, two-driver race for sports-racing prototypes from 1963 to 1966. Iconic cars such as the Ford GT40, Lotus 23B, and Chevron B6 competed in this high-speed event.

programme.title: F4 Spanish Championship
programme.desc: The new winter series for Spanish F4’s teams and drivers had been in development since the summer of 2024, as Feeder Series revealed in September,

programme.title: The Eyes Have It
programme.desc: We continue with step by step instructions in detail. On our trendy top tutorial, Angela Wolf is ready to add a cuff trim to her shirt. Then the eyes have it as first, Joanne Banko makes a glasses case with a design aesthetic perfect for a gift for your favorite guy! We finish with Kay Whitt and adding a sunglass pocket to a tote.

programme.title: Ski Trip
programme.desc: Hit the slopes in style. Designer and fabric expert Linda Lee uses a specialty fabric normally used for envelopes and home insulation to make a warm, stylish ski vest. Then, put your feet up and relax. Sewing educator Rebecca Kemp Brent captures vacation memories in a charming tuffet, embellished with top-stitching.

programme.title: Hammering, Torching and Shaping
programme.desc: Author and metal artist Mary Hettmansperger has some great ideas for hammering, texturing and coloring metal, plus using eyelets and rivets for cold connections. Katie's Beading Lesson is using snap finding to make jewelry quickly and easily.

programme.title: Southwest
programme.desc: Travel is not required to develop a sense of place, certain colors and materials might be the look you gravitate towards. This episode looks at southwest designs and its distinctive color palette and patterns. First, it's knitting with wire with Sara Oehler for a southwest look. Then meet Tracy Gonzales and a curved feather bracelet. Finally, Kate Richbourg has a bonus lesson to share. Desert landscapes and warm colors provide today's sense of place!

programme.title: Episode 8: Words and Lettering
programme.desc: Words and lettering can add an interesting element to your scrapbooking. First, May Flaum creates a canvas with a stamped bird and word cut outs. Next, Julie has some tips for hand lettering. Then, Dina Wakley demonstrates paint and ink techniques using a stencil with gesso and pattern resist. Julie has a last tip for embellishing and using letter stickers.

programme.title: Episode 5: Passage of Time
programme.desc: Seasons, tides, day to night; all of these elements of time are a part of nature. Host Julie Fei Fan Balzer has the first project. It is a cut away bag made with cork. Then Dina Wakley makes time for her artful pursuits, and finally it's the passage of time as Lynn Lilly celebrates a birthday party with a hot air balloon theme.

programme.title: The Knitting Circle Presented by CraftsyTV
programme.desc: Learn to knit with CraftsyTV.

programme.desc: Say hello to The Midnight Quilt Show, a series that celebrates late-night stitches, taking shortcuts and sewing in your PJs! Each week, host Angela Walters will bring you a quick and quippy breakdown of a brand new quilt… wine not included.

programme.desc: Paul is a thrill seeker who wants to find love fast with someone that also enjoys the active lifestyle. Bubbies Bunny, Linda, and SJ have some ideas to help and find Paul his one true, thrill-seeking love..

programme.title: Camryn and Milo Manheim

programme.title: THE KAMASUTRA GARDEN
programme.desc: A successful businessman, Steve Banks, an exotic madam, Sheila, and a scandalous sex guru, Swami Kamlesh, team up to start an elite brothel called The Kamasutra Garden in Nevada. What is so unique about this brothel? It is the only brothel in the world where the girls are trained in Kamasutra, the ancient art and science of lovemaking. At Steves request, an award-winning documentary filmmaker William visits The Kamasutra Garden to prepare a documentary about the brothel. Before visitingThe Kamasutra Garden, William had never been to a brothel He tucked in a remote desert town in Nevada, The Kamasutra Garden, where the girls were young, beautiful, and every mans fantasy. However, William soon discovered the complex lives and secrets of the women who worked there.

programme.title: MISS SOUTH PACIFIC: BEAUTY AND THE SEA
programme.desc: Indigenous beauty pagent contestants from South Pacific countries challenge developed nations to reduce carbon emissions before their island homes are submerged by rising seas. Fierce, passionate, and articulate, the Queens know that climate change is an issue that cannnot be addressed by one country alone. The entire world has a responsibility to reverse the tide before Pacific Islanders are swallowed up by the sea.

programme.title: Mess at Museum
programme.desc: Dunky takes Keet and Cat to the towns museum which is inside a home to a lot of precious artifacts.

programme.title: SPLIT PERSONALITY
programme.desc: A fresh morning in Hotel Kelifornia sees a cheeky Basha stealing a plate full of aaloo bonda and an angry Sundar chasing him out of the shop. The chase leads them to a coconut tree and Basha starts to throw coconuts at Sundar. One of the coconuts misses the target and bounces back hitting Basha on his head. The next moment Bashas whole attitude changes and he becomes a meek and obedient slave to Sundar. Sundar is inexplicably delighted at the exciting turn of events and he put Basha to hard labour in the shop. He is serving, cleaning, pressing Sundars legs, fanning for him and so on. Now Sundar is enjoying his life. But he still has to act all hard working in front of Chai Raja. During one of such charades a steel tumbler falls on Bashas head bringing him back to his real self. An unaware Sundar bosses around soon realizing that his good times have ended. Basha sees so much cleaning and rearranging done in the shop and he himself is too tired. Putting two and two together, it is payback time. And Sundar pays everything back..with interest.

programme.title: Dunky's Day in
programme.desc: Dunky has high fever and cannot tolerate any kind of noise. Cat has not had lunch as Dunky is sick… Keet fools him a lot by offering empty glasses for water..

programme.title: FIRST COME FIRST SERVE
programme.desc: Sundar wakes up late and finds a glaring Chai Raja stand towering over him. He rushes to take his station as business begins but alas his headache is about to get much worse for Basha has decided to sabotage each and every customer who walks in Chai Rajas door that day. To make matters worse, a wrestler turns up at the shop and demands that he be the one to be served first always. Chai Rajas rhythm is distorted by the wrestlers hankering and all goes for a toss. Basha disguises and manages to grab the wrestlers attention who now demands that Sundar serve Basha. But Sundar finds out its Basha and chases him. The lovestruck wrestler, woebegone at losing his love punches Sundar into orbit while Basha looks on gleefully.

programme.title: Laundry Business
programme.desc: It is laundry day for Don. And the rats are blocking his way from the first step itself. The whole place is a mess. But when Colonel comes in the picture, the war goes to the next level. Thanks to the rats, Don and Colonel now have nothing to wear.

programme.title: The Big Cleanup!
programme.desc: It’s a messy affair. Floors covered with mud, walls with cake splattered and filth in every nook and cranny. Don sweeps, mops, vacuums and leaves the house sparkling new but when he returns back after throwing the trash, the house is again bombarded with dirt! This goes on till Don and Colonel pack their bags and decide to leave the house. Will they ever return?

programme.title: Count it out
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: A Cola Fix !!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are into a new business – COLONEL COLA!!! But there are three unwanted partners – of course the rats! With them running loose in the factory, the dogs have a hard time keeping themselves alive, let alone the business stand. Business turns into a busy mess.

programme.title: Pool Off
programme.desc: Ever seen sharks in a swimming pool? The Rat-a-tat swimming pool has many such surprises including grenades, sharks and weights! Watch Colonel twist and turn to woo a hottie.

programme.title: Wheres Kala?
programme.desc: When Kala wants to practise her stealth moves, Gummy and Harry volunteer to help her. Soon Kala is scaring them from various hiding places. After a while the duo doesn’t find Kala anymore, they go too paranoid thinking that Kala is plotting an elaborate scaring plan. Gummy and Harry do all sort of crazy things until they find out that Kala actually went away for her audition in the middle of the game.

programme.title: SPACE INVADER
programme.desc: Krackleflint is back with the latest and greatest diabolical offering from Krackleflint Industries Inc.

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: Mango Season
programme.desc: It’s the mango season and Dunky has to guard all the mangoes so that no one will steal them. He has taken the help of Cat and Keet to guard them from Hoodie and the mean cat gang.

programme.title: Check Out Yuk
programme.desc: When Yuk accidentally gets stuck in a book and the book gets checked out of the library, he comes face to face with the dangers of being out in the real world.Will he survive all the twists and turns his journey takes him on? Will he ever make it back to the library in one piece? Will Icky and Yicky have to continue on as a duo? Watch the crazy shenanigans in the episode Yuk Checks Out!

programme.title: SUNDAR SANTA
programme.desc: Its Christmas and Chai Raja makes Sundar lug in a mini-tree as a decorative centrepiece for the special day (decorations are beautifully coloured snacks on a tree made of green chillies). His job profile also includes handing out small gifts from below the tree to the regular patrons of the shop. Sundar loyally goes on with his chores trying his best to sweeten up the Chai experience for the clientele with his Christmassy cheer. Basha, feeling some of the joy of giving himself, decides to give Sundar off from chasing and turns up at the shop with merely the intention of watching the celebration. Sundar however pranks Basha with a rigged gift giving the latter a sore spot on his behind. Now it is officially revenge and Basha decides to spoil Sundars day. What follows next is when Basha comes in various Christmas diguises as a variety of santas, as einderretc thus stealing the gifts, food and also making Sundars life a living hell. The Christmas is not emrry anymore for Sundar.

programme.title: CHAI-LLENGE
programme.desc: What seems like a normal day turns quite nasty for Chai Raja as he finds an elaborately dressed Japanese) at the steps of his tea shop. He also has a sumo as his assistant. The benign looking Japanese asks for a tea challenge which Chai Raja proudly take up. After all, who can beat Chai Raja?!But the Japanese proves to have some tricks up his sleeve and Chai Rajas reputation may be in danger. The Japanese man shows some stunning tea making skills. Throw into this stressed situation, the impish Basha who finds out that all the commotion just makes it easier for him to lay hands on his favourite banana fries. Chai Raja manages to match the Japanese brew for brew- even the green tea, which Chai Raja matches with his own tulsi and elaichi brew. He even somersaults, skips and even makes tea blindfolded. And he has Sundar as his assistant. The sumo assistant is totally floored by Chai Rajas performance and he applauds, only to get whacked by his boss. But then the irked Japanese presents a tea with the colours of the rainbow. It seems as if Chai Raja is ousted when, Basha chooses the moment to annoy Sundar and the two chase. They accidentally knock over the Japanese mans trunk and out fall not ingredients but readymade teabags...the Japanese man has been cheating while Chai Raja had made his brews from scratch. The Japanese man and his assistant are sent packing minus his dignity while for once Sundar and Basha sit side by side, wolfing down banana fritters served to them as reward by a beaming Chai Raja.

programme.title: Mangorush
programme.desc: Hurray!! It is mango season and Don is ready to fill his belly. But lary marly and charly are all set for the loot. With mangoes and grenades all around, they all get what they deserv

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Kiwi, flightless birds
programme.desc: When the gods were still ruling the world, when trees and flowers on the ground began to wither due to insects, the goddess WI-Go asks Kiwi to do the hard work of catching insects, and she readily accepts the GoGo.

programme.title: THAT SINKING FEELING
programme.desc: Mei decides to impress Negu with an art museum. He has the Rock-Eating Mutant pull down old buildings to build the museum. The Guardians’ “island” starts to sink. Pai “fishes” for the cause of the sinking and pulls up the Mutant, whom they entice to eat something besides rocks.

programme.title: Ghost Attack
programme.desc: Its Friday the 13th. Cat is watching a late night horror movie and all creeped out when it ends…a perfect opportunity for Keet to get even.

programme.title: The Incredible Shrinking Gummy.
programme.desc: A weird gizmo in Granny Peters’ lab winds up shrinking Gummy down to a tiny size, and he must cope with a suddenly-HUGE world... while trying to contact pals Harry and Kala and figure out some way to get back to normal.

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn Valeo
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Jack and the Beanstalk
programme.desc: A kind boy GoGo finds a bean seed and grows it, which sprouts all the way into the clouds. GoGo climbs the plant and finds the Giants castle above the clouds.

programme.title: Planet Gadget
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Little Lost Dino
programme.desc: When Sneevil uses his newest contraption, the Dinocaller, he gets more than he hoped for. First, a small dinosaur who doesnt destroy the Smighties, but instead becomes Melodys pet, followed by his larger and angrier mommy and daddy dino.

programme.title: Mission Keet
programme.desc: Cat is frustrated that he can’t catch Keet. As he is shuffling through channels he sees ad on TV of the ‘Super Ace Parrot Catchers’ A quick call gets a snobbish Black suited cat with a briefcase Knocking on the door.

programme.title: Spooktacular.
programme.desc: The gang is ‘haunted’ by a mystery spook – and sets out to overcome their collective fear and get to the bottom of the scary mystery.

programme.title: Bun For The Road
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in a sprightly mood, his head zinging with ideas for a fresh menu but just as he is about to jot them on the blackboard, a throat clears behind him. Chai Raja turns to find a beaming salesman selling buns who wants Chai Raja to take a trial batch of his buns. Chai Raja doesnt much care for the pushy salesman from the start, but really loses his temper when the salesman implies that his buns are better than Chai Rajas fritters. An incensed Chai Raja orders Sundar to take care of the salesman so that he himself can get on with the days menu, as customers have started coming. Sundar immediately gets his guard face on and sends the salesman scuttling though little does he know that the stubborn guy has snuck back into the yard and is keeping an eye out for an opportunity to thrust his trial buns in Chai Rajas face. The salesman spots Basha neatly outwitting Sundar and decides to recruit the latter to worm his way into Chai Rajas presence- the salesman wants to prove his point and force Chai Raja to buy his buns. Basha expecting fritters as payment accepts and gets to work distracting Sundar. The salesman sneaks in and starts switching the snacks and soon Chai Raja faces foul-tempered customers who point at their plates in protest. Sundar is immediately summoned and given an earful- a confused Sundar suddenly spots the lurking salesman and realizes who the saboteur is. A chase ensues made hilarious by Bashas intervention that Chai Raja ends by landing a griddle splat on the salesmans hindquarters and sending him flying. Basha is left fritter-less but then spots the suitcase of buns that the salesman dropped

programme.title: Balloonastics
programme.desc: When Pancake becomes bored with a household chore, he gives up in frustration. Later in the Zooniverse, he’s delighted to help the fallen North Star return to the night sky, but first he has to learn to value the smaller task he has been given, and how it can add to the whole. Be open minded and optimistic, and you’ll be able to take pride in any job!

programme.title: Dunky's Laundry
programme.desc: GrandPa has entrusted Dunky to get his special Yellow shirt washed and ironed ready. Meanwhile a funny sequence of events and chase is happening between Cat and Keet.

programme.title: Street Cats
programme.desc: Cat is king at GrandPA’s house but out on the street it’s a different story. The “Mean Cats” are a local gang of street cats that always pull a fast one on Cat.

programme.title: Dinosaur crossing
programme.desc: A young prehistoric boy is struggling with a dinosaur that in its frantic race threatens to overwhelm all. With the help of a chameleon, the twins will help the boy to resolve the situation.

programme.title: A Star Is Jumped
programme.desc: Odessa learns to leap over stars by starting on low ones,Persistence pays off, especially when you learn from each step along the way, building up to the final goal.

programme.title: Maroon
programme.desc: When Kala tells Gummy and Harry that her favourite color is maroon, the pair decide to give her an ‘all maroon’ birthday surprise – but they soon learn that there can sometimes be ‘too much of a good thing’.

programme.title: Merry Go Bush
programme.desc: Pancake isn’t taking care of his new pet fish appropriately, even though he’s trying super-hard. When he arrives in the Zoonivese and tries to help Ene take care of a Merry-Go-Bush, he learns to that there’s a right way, and a wrong way, to care for something (by following the rules), no matter the good intentions

programme.title: The Tin Soldier
programme.desc: The brass soldier, GoGo who entered the playroom where the toys lived has no leg. A soldier who feels homogeneity with a ballerina who always stands with one leg up. But the soldier is caught up in a clown trap and falls out of the window.

programme.title: Crosswalk Harry
programme.desc: Harry gets a job as a crosswalk guard and winds up taking his duties VERY seriously, to the point of nearly driving Gummy crazy when he wants to just cross the street.

programme.title: Camping Trip
programme.desc: In a multi-coloured SUV, Don and Colonel with their bagpacks zipped are set for a camping trip. Watch them in close contact with nature and “trouble”.

programme.title: GLOVE OF THE SOUTH
programme.desc: Negu is thrilled to learn there is a Glove of the South hidden on the Guardians’ island. He sends a big-eyed mutant, The Finder, to find the glove and bring it to him. The Guardians try to stop The Finder, but fail. Luckily, when Negu dons the Glove of the South, it tickles him mercilessly! The Glove of the South was a trick, invented by the Elders!

programme.title: April’s Rain
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to tidy up their island. Negu seizes the chance to send his Dust Mutant to make the island even dirtier. Pai and Xia ask April to make it rain and clean everything effortlessly. But April hasn’t yet mastered this power, and accidentally creates a tornado. Fortunately it defeats the Dust Monster… but unfortunately, it leaves a total mess, and they still have to tidy up.

programme.title: Straw
programme.desc: Reduce waste by giving straws a second more fun life!

programme.title: Wasteland
programme.desc: The twins clean a wasteland to make it a nicer playground to play in.

programme.title: Doobydoo Meep Concert
programme.desc: The annual Doobydoo Meep concert is about to take place, and Charlie wants to practice one last time before heading out. So Deedee chips in by agreeing to follow specific instructions to organise the difficult to manage Doobydoos but also promises not to use magic for anything at all. Deedee mixes up the sandwiches for the Doodyboos with the recorders that she ends up sending off with Mewmew. Nino constantly keeps Deedee in check so that she doesn’t back out of her promise. Mewmew is having a tough time organising with the Doobydoos while Deedee finds out Charlie has slept of practising. The concert goes well, but they all decide they won’t have lullabies ever again.

programme.title: TUNNEL OF WHUH
programme.desc: After limited success with the direct assault approach, Durian grey employs some more underhanded tactics to destroy the Ninjas from the inside.

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: Mewmew’s Hiccups
programme.desc: Mewmew is out exploring with a spring in his step and song in his mouth. Deedee and Nino are surprised to hear him sing and sets up a proposition for Mewmew to sing at the concert hall with Tiggy’s lemonade stand nearby. The concert is all set and so is Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Mewmew is parched with practising so long and is totally refreshed with Tiggy’s minty lemonade, but it turns out he’s got the hiccups. All the conjured tactics to beat the hiccups, including Tiggy’s super sour lemon lime sherbet fizzerade doesn’t seem to work. Only magic seems to stop this stubborn bout of hiccups in time for the concert. The spell works on Mewmew but backfires and the bubblecordion gets a fit of hiccups. Mewmew is so sad, but it turns out that the townsfolk are mesmerized by the bubbles. Alas, the bubbles are about to tip over Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Suddenly the blaring horns of Tika Pila gives everybody a shock of surprise, even the bubblecordion that the hiccups come to a halt. Now that the lemonade stand is safe, lemonade is served all around. Mewmew is all set for the concert, which surprisingly ends with a sneeze.

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: Better Than You
programme.desc: Pancake must come to terms with not being better at something than his little sister Maple, which is mirrored in the Zooniverse when he tries to help the Zoonicorns build Jiggly Stone wall. Even when you’re not the best at something, you can always be helpful.

programme.title: Scary Face
programme.desc: Pancake over-teases Maple with his new “scary face,” then gets a taste of his own medicine in the Zooniverse when, as the old saying goes, his face freezes that way. Just because you think something is fun or funny doesn’t mean everybody else is having the same good time you are.

programme.title: The Violinist
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old violin and, on discovering that he’s a distant descendant famous musician of “Gummy Stradi-bear-ius”, he starts playing the violin non-stop... driving everyone around him completely nuts.

programme.title: The Wet Cat
programme.desc: Cat is chasing Keet in the mud and gets dirty, GrandPA is in the garden watering the plants he points the hose pipe to Cat and gets him wet and tells Dunky to give him a long due bath. Much to Keets amusement.

programme.title: This Is Speed Racer
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: Simpleton – The Queen Bee
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the story of the “Queen Bee”, by the Brothers Grimm, having been called out by a KING, the father of 3 sons who set out in search of adventures. That was some time ago and none of the three has returned, and the KING has received no news. SANDRA and FO will find them, turned to stone, in an enchanted castle. The detective and her assistant will try to solve the mystery and bring the three princes back to life, taking on the guardian of the castle, a sinister, silent DWARF.

programme.title: Brains Math Problem
programme.desc: rain’s alter ego Braianna has a reputation as a clumsy C student. When her math teacher pushes her to it, she blurts out the correct answer to an impossible equation, leading Mr. Fractal to assume she must be cheating. He demands a meeting with her parents, and her Fake Robot Parents nearly blow her cover.

programme.title: Baghdad in Bloom
programme.desc: Aladdin buys magic seeds from the market with the food money believing the plant will bring him riches. However when it doesnt grow he and Jamillah enlist Genie to help, he does his thing and suddenly the plant grows! Everyone in town hears about the plant and comes to see it in Aladdins garden - hoping that they too will get blessed with riches. Even the Sultan comes to see its beauty. The crowd waits with bated breath but when it opens - it stinks like smelly cheese. The crowd disperse but the Sultan is transfixed by the rare scent. He sees the value and beauty in it where others dont and gives Aladdin gold in exchange for the plant.

programme.title: Bicycle Chase
programme.desc: It’s a lovely day . Dunky is busy oiling his old cycle - until Cat comes around snatches the cycle , removes its wheels and rolls it to the top of the house chasing Keet even on the electric cables.

programme.title: Pancake Icorn
programme.desc: When Pancake is having a particularly bad day, he imagines a better life – then becomes a Zoonicorn!, Appreciating the normal yet wonderful and special things in life that happen every day.

programme.title: Harvest Attack
programme.desc: Its harvest time and Dunky has given Cat the duty of protecting the fields with a sling and pebbles and Keet is to give him warnings if Hoodie the crow attacks the field with his gang

programme.title: Eye Strain
programme.desc: The rat trio takes their plan one step ahead by fixing contact lens in Don’s eyes while he is asleep, thereby blurring his vision. Now the rats just partyyyyy and Don can’t see a thing. But when Colonel finds out the plan, the naughty rats are definitely in for a surprise.

programme.title: Scolymus – The Sorcerer’s Apprentice
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the SORCERER’S APPRENTICE, having been called out by the old sorcerer and mentor in the story. When he returned from his journey, he found his tower full of water, as in the classic tale. But, unlike the story, his APPRENTICE had also mysteriously disappeared. SANDRA will discover that the APPRENTICE has been kidnapped by SCOLYMUS, a sinister spirit invoked by the apprentice to do his work for him.

programme.title: Hiccups
programme.desc: A pesky case of the hiccups defies the oddest attempts at curing it – and, in fact, proves more than a little contagious!

programme.title: Christmas Episode
programme.desc: Its Christmas time and Gummy Bear and all his pals are out to celebrate Christmas. They are going to have some serious fun along with some surprises!!

programme.title: The Fly.
programme.desc: A pesky fly won’t leave Gummy alone, and ends up driving him increasingly nuts in his escalating obsession to get rid of it.

programme.title: I Gotta Go !
programme.desc: Rise and Shine Don- it’s a normal morning at the Doggy household…but wait.. whats the mice upto in the bathroom…Looks like there is no way Don can start his day normally ever!

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: Duda Buddy
programme.desc: Duda thinks the Scottie Buddy is pretty awesome and asks Scot if he could go for a ride. Scot flatly refuses, so Duda is determined to make a Scottie Buddy of his own. Realizing that it is difficult to make one, Duda returns to Scot hoping for some help. Scot agrees to help Duda if he becomes his assistant. But Duda ends up causing more chaos instead of being helpful. Scot sends him off with a box of old parts and tells him to make his own Duda Buddy. Surprisingly, Duda manages to build a decent replica. Meanwhile, Scot discovers that his new wheel is not suitable for Scottie Buddy and wants him to return his old wheel to Duda...

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: Banding Together
programme.desc: When Maple joins the Zoonicorns’ band, her off-kilter playing disrupts the entire Zooniverse. Working together/Not giving up.

programme.title: 52 The Zoonigames
programme.desc: Pancake is disheartened when Odessa beats him at a game, but after playing a series of games in the Zooniverse, he learns there’s something even more important than winning-or-losing. Playing games is not about winning or losing but bout having fun!

programme.title: Oh It's So Noisy!
programme.desc: Tomorrow is Scots birthday and hes busy preparing for when Duda shows up and causes total chaos in Scots house. With his house in ruins, Scot stays overnight at Dudas house. However, Dudas loud snoring keeps Scot awake all night. Scot hopes to close his eyes after Duda leaves in the morning, but the constant noises outside drive him crazy. The friends plan a surprise party for Scot; Unfortunately, the clueless Scott exploits them and tells them to shut up. Later, Scot goes to look for his friends, but they are nowhere to be found. Scot is sad because he thinks he has alienated his friends. As he walks home alone, he hears his name being called. Its Duda and the others! They surprise you with a special gift.

programme.title: Planet Gadget
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: STICKY SITUATION
programme.desc: Having used his Mystic Stick to defeat a giant beaver, Pai loves his weapon more than ever. Spying, Negu gets an idea. The Guardians’ and the Elders’ possessions start to go missing, and they keep being tricked. A mysterious expert declares the culprit to be…Pai’s stick! But just as Xia’s about to burn the stick, it turns into a mutant Stick Insect sent by Negu! The Guardians battle the mutant and defeat it using Pai’s beloved stick.

programme.title: SWITCHING PLACES
programme.desc: After arguing about whose avatar is more difficult to control, Xia and April swap magic accessories. Xia becomes the Panther Warrior and April becomes the Dragon Warrior. Unfortunately, just as they’re struggling to control each other’s avatars, Negu’s latest mutant attacks: his beloved pet “cat,” Kanna. The Guardians manage to capture Kanna, so Mei, Koto, and Amkko race to the Yan World to retrieve her – which is just what the Guardians want!

programme.title: Shout
programme.desc: Maple keeps forgetting to use appropriate voice levels when interacting with others. Outside Voices vs. Inside Voice. (Learn by practicing to) Use the proper volume in the appropriate environments

programme.title: Paint It Back
programme.desc: Odessa gets angry when her chalk drawing is ruined by a rainstorm. In the Zooniverse, she discovers that all the color has drained away, and she and the Zoonicorns must "paint" the hues back. In the process, she discovers methods to manage her anger and frustration. How to manage anger and frustration in a positive manner.

programme.title: Squirrel Scare
programme.desc: Fred can’t believe that Brains is afraid of anything, let alone little tiny squirrels. Every year their town is overrun with hundreds of migrating squirrels! Together they struggle to rid the town of squirrels.

programme.title: La nuera del general
programme.desc: Irina es una prometedora cirujana y una chica muy dulce. Su futura suegra está empeñada en arruinar su vida.

programme.title: La nuera del general
programme.desc: Irina es una prometedora cirujana y una chica muy dulce. Su futura suegra está empeñada en arruinar su vida.

programme.title: Los laberintos del destino
programme.desc: Las familias de los pequeños Sveta y Pasha son muy unidas. Inesperadamente ellos quedan huérfanos.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Investigative reporter Joshua Philipp examines the deeper meaning behind the day's news.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: SuperDad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Soul Detective

Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: 20 Days

programme.title: Incredible Tales 8
programme.desc: The Spooktacular series, Incredible Tales featuring the paranormal encounters of ordinary people, returns for an 8th installment.

programme.title: 20 Days

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days

As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.desc: On the French Riviera, a female cat is frightened by sudden outbursts of barking by every dog around her. But then Shep becomes obsessed by a newspaper story proclaiming a real canine hero the nation's "No. 1 Dog."

programme.title: Midnight Manhunt-1945
programme.desc: In a cheap hotel room in New York City Jelke shoots gangster Joe Wells, takes a package from his pocket and flees.Wells staggers into an alley. On her way to her apartment above a wax museum, Sue Gallagher, a reporter for the Chronicle, finds Wells' body and hides his corpse among the wax-figures in the museum and calls her paper to send a photographer so she can get a scoop on the killing of Wells, who had a $5,000 reward for his capture, dead or alive. Meanwhile, Henry Miggs, the museum owner find the body and is ready to call the police but his handyman, Clutch Tracy tells him to conceal it and avoid suspicion. From this point on it is a game of where-is-the-body....and the stolen South American diamonds Wells was carrying.

programme.desc: During a big storm, a giant cargo ship was operated in violation of regulations and caught fire. The rescue bureau launched a comprehensive rescue plan. Plantados
programme.desc: When Ramon discovers that Mauricio, one of the cruelest prison guards he remembers from being incarcerated in Cuba, lives in Florida, he begins to recall various traumatic instances experienced with his torturer. Along with two sons of others ex "plantados", Ramon kidnaps Mauricio and forces him to face the many cruelties he delivered.

programme.title: Codigo Paz
programme.desc: Pedro Ruiz is a Dominican real estate broker by day and a savvy but out-of-luck thief by night. He dreams of a better life and easy money. Desperate to look for respect climbing the money ladder the easy way, he gets in the wrong mansion at the wrong time.

programme.title: Halcón Negro
programme.desc: Upon Dario's return to his hometown, from which he had been absent for a long time, his lifelong friend Cenobio informed him of the extortions, kidnappings, and violence suffered by the town by the Calaveras, a group of thugs and ruthless killers who have taken over the region.

programme.title: El Ejecutor
programme.desc: Montana is a hitman at the service of the cartel, his methods are somewhat bloodthirsty but infallible. When the niece of the capo is kidnapped by a gang of violent gunmen led by El Buitre, a bloodthirsty murderer, Montana has to intervene.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar aficionado Kyle Lenz to review the bold Cromagnon cigar. Together, they explore its rich, intense flavors, perfect draw, and overall experience, offering their expert opinions on why this cigar stands out in its category.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Every Cigar lounge has a story to tell, for Arnold Serafin that story spans generations. As a 4th generation cigar roller Arnold has a lot to say about the industry, family, and what truly brings people together : Cigars.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Sean sits down with Lynn Hawkins of Placencia Cigars, one of the most respected names in the industry. Lynn pulls back the curtain on Placencia's extensive history as a leading grower and producer, sharing insights into their meticulous tobacco cultivation, the intricate art of their cigar manufacturing process, and what makes their family's legacy truly stand out in the world of premium cigars.

programme.title: Privada Masterclass
programme.desc: Explore the origins of cigars in this in-depth masterclass, where we focus on the science and story behind tobacco seeds. Discover how these tiny yet powerful seeds shape the flavor, aroma, and character of the finest cigars.

programme.title: Id Tap That Cigar Show
programme.desc: Coming to you live from the Drew Estate Experience Acid Studios in Florida. Our guest tonight is Nick Melillo Of Foundation Cigars

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Cigar Show
programme.desc: Jack Torano and Hector Alfonso Sr., Espinosa Cigars.

programme.title: Confessions Of A Time Traveler The Man From 3036
Guests Jamal Bates, Rai Jackson and Blake Tyler
programme.desc: Contestants answer trivia questions about Aquarius celebrities, trending news, music, and Black History & Culture to win cash prizes.

programme.title: Guest Van Lathan
programme.desc: Van Lathan is an amazing broadcaster and creator who I’ve admired for a long time but never met until now but moments after meeting him I felt like I’d known him forever. It’s fun to talk to a great conversationalist like him.

programme.title: Guest Josh Johnson - 2023
programme.desc: Josh Johnson is an hysterical stand up and a good friend. It’s always an incredible convo with him.

programme.title: Guest Be My Fiasco
programme.desc: Be My Fiasco joins the show to talk about her new album, “Pretty Little Love.”

programme.title: At Home with The Jenners - Planting Roots
programme.desc: From garden to gourmet, join Cayley & Brandon Jenner as they unleash flavors of plant-based cooking.

programme.title: Give Me Shelter - Film
programme.desc: Celebrities are on a mission to save animals caught in the crosshairs of human arrogance and greed.

programme.title: The Human Experiment
programme.desc: A riveting documentary about chemicals being poured into our lives in various ways.

programme.title: Lake Terror
programme.desc: Remington has escaped the evil cabin but now the evil continues to follow him, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Meanwhile, Chloe and Revel look for a missing sister that went to the evil cabin in the previous installment. The two meet Vincent, a failing TV host, to help psychically contact the missing sister. That's when a gunshot rings out in the night and the three meet Remington. Now they all must battle for their lives against the evil that pursues Remington to once and for all lock the evil away for good...

programme.title: Jack and Jill: The Hills of Hell
programme.desc: After searching for her missing daughter, a lady and her search party discover the legend behind the murderous pair of Jack and Jill...

programme.title: Village of the Vampire
programme.desc: Rebecca is searching for her sister, a young journalist who went missing while investigating a series of unfortunate events. The trail leads her to Timere, a remote place far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life, where amidst the tight lipped silence of the town's inhabitants there's an ever growing fear of dark forces at work and no-one dares to leave their home at night. Here Rebecca meets an extravagant writer, the church warden of the town and above all Caleb, a charming, rich and elegant man whose dark gaze hides a chilling secret. It's in this town, where time appears to move between the shadows and danger lurks around every corner that Rebecca learns of the terrible truth and the battle between good and evil begins...

programme.title: Jack y Jill 3
programme.desc: 10 años después de los últimos asesinatos atroces en la colina, Jack y Jill están de regreso para masacrar al elenco y al equipo de un programa de Internet en vivo que busca descubrir los secretos de la leyenda...

programme.title: El Demonio Interior
programme.desc: Años después de salir de la cárcel, Sam Parsons intenta rehacer su vida con su mujer Courtney y su hija Harper. Trabaja duro para mantener a su familia y permitirse una bonita casa en su tranquilo barrio de las afueras. Cuando empiezan a ocurrir sucesos sobrenaturales en la casa, Sam teme por la seguridad de su mujer y su hija. Cuando los sucesos se convierten en ataques, Sam contrata a Corbin Carlysle y a su equipo de cazafantasmas conocido como «The Ghost Killers», para que le ayuden a luchar contra la entidad oscura que acecha en las sombras de su casa. Cuando las cosas empiezan a complicarse y queda claro que esta entidad es mucho más peligrosa que el típico fantasma, surgen complicaciones cuando Corbin y su equipo se centran más en la fama y la fortuna. Para ganar esta lucha Sam debe luchar contra sus propios demonios interiores y volver a su violento pasado. Para salvar a sus seres queridos, un Demonio debe enfrentarse a un Demonio.

programme.title: Portal de Monstruos de H.P. Lovecraft
programme.desc: Una secta está a punto de despertar a la criatura más temida de H.P. Lovecraft...

programme.title: Jack y Jill
programme.desc: Una adaptación terrorífica de la canción infantil Jack y Jill. Un grupo de amigos afligidos por una pérdida reciente se reúnen sólo para descubrir que están siendo perseguidos por Jack y Jill...

programme.title: Asesinos Sin Ley
programme.desc: Mickey y Jenny son imigrantes indocumentados, un dia el patrón de Jenny trata de abusar de ella, Mickey lo sorprende y lo mata haceindo justicia por su propia mano así se desatan una cacería de criminales abusadores, todo lo sueben a las redes convirtiéndose en los anti-héroes más populares por hacer justicia a los desamparados.

programme.title: El Gavilán Justiciero
programme.desc: Historia llena de acción donde la codicia y la ambición desatan la más cruenta lucha, que trae como consecuencia el sufrimiento de una familia y la envidia de otra.

programme.title: Somos Pobres
programme.desc: Una familia muy pobre espera la Navidad con gran entusiasmo para celebrar y ver lo que les trae Santa Claus. Los niños van al cerro a cortar un árbol y decorarlo para poner los regalos que les traerá su padre después de vender la cosecha. Sin embargo, cuando el padre llega, está borracho y sin dinero, destrozando el árbol y golpeando a sus hijos. Uno de ellos decide huir de casa y, más tarde, entra en el negocio de las drogas.

programme.title: Expediente 53 3.0
programme.desc: Un extraño ser del más allá regresa con sed de venganza para acabar con todas las personas que lo han estado atormentando por todos estos años, decidiendo poseer a Jack y darle más fuerza a Baal.

programme.title: El Mariachi Gringo
programme.desc: Comedia romántica sobre un joven de la América profunda que -tras tener como improvisado maestro de guitarra a un emigrante- viaja a México huyendo de su vida tediosa y de su familia, para ejercitarse como mariachi.

programme.title: El Duende
programme.desc: Rosalía se muda a la ciudad junto a su hijo pequeño, Ramiro. Con la ayuda de una conocida, consigue encontrar vivienda. La casa ha estado cerrada por décadas, y tiene un horno antiguo. Lo que Rosalía ignora es que dentro del horno habita un duende que tiene por costumbre robar niños.

programme.title: Bigfoot Contra D.B.Cooper
programme.desc: Cuando varios jóvenes cazadores llegan a un albergue apartado en el noroeste del pacífico, no saben que serán cazados.

programme.title: La Otra Palabra
programme.desc: Película documental que se adentra a lo más profundo de las prácticas esotéricas más antiguas. ¿Qué es la magia? ¿Es jugar con el diablo?

programme.title: Catemaco: Magia y Misterio
programme.desc: Una familia normal va de vacaciones a Catemaco, Michoacan un pueblo famoso y pintoresco en Mexico. Todo marcha bien hasta que son atacados por criminales, el padre sobrevive, y con ayuda del brujo mayor del pueblo cobra venganza.

programme.title: A Steady Hand For A Sudden Blessing
programme.desc: In “A Steady Hand For A Sudden Blessing,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us that even when we don’t see God moving, His hand still holds us steadily.

programme.title: Dig Until God Does
programme.desc: It will flow when it’s supposed to. In “Dig Until God Does,” Pastor Steven Furtick shows us how to plant seeds of faith in the dry seasons of our lives until God brings the rain.

programme.title: I'm Going Through But I'm Running Over
programme.desc: Don’t lose heart. In “I’m Going Through But I’m Running Over,” Pastor Steven reveals that even though you may face adversity, God is with you — and He’s making a way through.

programme.title: The Gift Of Grief
programme.desc: Some of us have believed the lie that “sad is bad,” and we’ve only brought our positivity to God. But when we bring our disappointment to Him, we learn that difficult seasons can become the cornerstone of our faith. Lisa Harper encourages us that our compassionate God is near in “The Gift Of Grief.”
